description.name: thcbep20
description.tagline: Transhuman Coin bep20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto bep20-thc Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept Transhuman Coin bep20 directly on your website
Unique bep20/thc receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your bep20/thc wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
